source:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SEQ_00Kabuto appears to be in better spirits than when you last met.
※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限
碧のタマミズのカブトは、冒険者を待っているようだ。

source:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SEQ_01Though Tsukumo is gone, Kabuto has labored tirelessly to carry out the Divine Circle's duty of searching for treasure. So much so, his brothers insist he take a rest. With his newly acquired free time, Kabuto has chosen to visit the various peoples of Othard who made contributions to the treasure vault, and wants you to accompany him. He decides to begin his journey with a visit to Gyokei in Yanxia.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SEQ_01※本クエストには
「 レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限」が、
　設定されています。
　受注時と同じクラス・ジョブでのみ進行できます。

カブトから、ツクモとともに縁を結んだ人々を訪れる旅に同行するよう依頼された。ヤンサのユヅカ代官屋敷にいる「ギョケイ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SEQ_02<tab>Kabuto is happy to hear that all is well with Gyokei. He grows concerned, however, when mention of Tsukumo is met with a look of bewilderment. In the end, Kabuto surmises his lack of memory stems from the trauma of being attacked by the Red Kojin. He bids Gyokei farewell and makes for the Azim Steppe to meet with Uchikin and his father.
target: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SEQ_02<tab>ギョケイと話した。彼は、ツクモのことを忘れてしまっていた。当時、ギョケイは紅甲羅に襲われていたため、気が動転していたのかもしれない。アジムステップの再会の市にいる「ウチキン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SEQ_03<tab>The Qestiri father and son are glad for Kabuto's visit, thanking him again for his help retrieving Uchikin's bow. As he struggles to communicate, Kabuto makes mention of Tsukumo, who was quite adept at interpreting their gestures. Uchikin and his father can only shrug in response. It soon dawns on Kabuto that they too have no recollection of his divine companion. Concerned now that everyone has forgotten Tsukumo, he rushes to Kugane to speak with the one person who is certain to remember him─Shihoumi.
target: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SEQ_03<tab>ウチキン親子と話したが、彼らもまたツクモのことを覚えていなかった。不安になったカブトは、ツクモを譲ってくれたシホウミに確認するという。クガネの小鍛冶屋付近にいる「シホウミ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SEQ_04<tab>Kabuto is relieved to hear that Shihoumi does, in fact, remember gifting him Tsukumo. His worry returns when it becomes clear she has no memory of the doll ever being animate. The only ones left likely to remember are his fellow Kojin. He returns to Tamamizu to speak with the other members of the Divine Circle, fearful of what they might say.
target: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SEQ_04<tab>シホウミと話した。彼女は、ツクモのことを覚えてはいたものの、ツクモが動き話していたことは思い出せないようだ。カブトは、宝探衆の仲間に確認するという。紅玉海の碧のタマミズにいる「ブンチン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SEQ_05<tab>With his brothers assembled, Kabuto asks them if they remember Tsukumo, the kami that founded the Divine Circle. While they do remember Tsukumo, they are dumbfounded by the claim that a doll was the founder of their order. As far as they can recall, it was Kabuto who brought them together. Kabuto is baffled by the notion and insists it was Tsukumo. Hearing the conviction in his voice, Bunchin is reminded of a similar experience from his past. He relays this story to Kabuto, explaining that Tsukumo's purpose was to guide him on a journey of enlightenment that only he was meant to remember. The once reclusive warrior is now an affable leader, more determined than ever to see his people prosper.
target: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SEQ_05<tab>ブンチンと話し、宝探衆にも確認したが、やはりツクモが動き話していた記憶はなかった。しかし、ブンチンも過去に似た経験をしていたという。カブトにとって、ツクモは確実に存在し、今の縁や宝はツクモの贈り物だという。そんな大事な縁を守り、宝を増やすとあらためて決意したカブトは、今後も、仲間とともにさらに活躍していくことだろう。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Gyokei at Yuzuka Manor.
target: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_TODO_00<tab>ユヅカ代官屋敷のギョケイと話す

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Uchikin in Reunion.
target: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_TODO_01<tab>再会の市のウチキンと話す

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Shihoumi in Kugane.
target: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_TODO_02<tab>クガネのシホウミと話す

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Bunchin in Tamamizu.
target: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_TODO_03<tab>碧のタマミズのブンチンと話す

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I was hoping you would visit.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_000)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、よくぞ来てくれたぁ～。
実は、貴殿を待っていたのだぁ～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_001<tab>Things have not been quite the same since we lost Tsukumo, but I've taken his words to heart. My every waking moment has been devoted to seeking treasures for our vault.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_001ツクモが動くことを止めてからというもの、
その言葉を胸に、必死で仲間と助け合ってきたぁ～。
おかげで、新たに結んだ縁も増えつつある～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_002<tab>We've made great progress, but the others insist I take a break if only for a short while.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_002近頃の仲間たちは、頼もしいばかり～。
そんな彼らが、これまで休みなく駆けてきた拙者に、
少しばかり暇を取れと、せっついてくるのだぁ～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_003<tab>Rather than sit idle here in Tamamizu, I thought my time would be better spent visiting the good people of Othard who made contributions to the treasure vault.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_003暇と言っても、何をすればいいやら……。
悩んだ末に、これまでツクモと貴殿とともに、
縁を結んだ人々を訪ねようと、思い立ったのだぁ～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_004<tab>It will be a wonderful trip, made all the better by your company. If you would join me, come to Yanxia. I plan to start by paying a visit to Gyokei.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_004どうか、貴殿もこの旅に同道願いたい～。
まずはヤンサに赴き、「ギョケイ」殿を訪ねようぞぉ～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_009<tab>It's been too long since I've come to Yanxia. Judging by the lack of birds overhead, he's no longer plagued by that cursed vase.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_009ヤンサを訪れるのも、久方ぶり……。
不幸の壺は、あれから戻ってはきておらぬようだなぁ～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_GYOKEI_000_010<tab>My, what a surprise. I trust all has been well since your last visit, yes, yes?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_GYOKEI_000_010ぺぺぺ、久しぶりだっぺな！！
達者にしてたっぺか！？

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_011<tab>Quite well, thank you. Trade with you and the other Namazu has been a boon. I came today to offer you thanks on behalf of the Blue Kojin.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_011拙者どもは、見てのとおり達者だぁ～。
ギョケイ殿のおかげで商売繁盛、宝物殿のお宝も増え申したぁ～。
今日は、その礼を伝えに参ったぁ～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_GYOKEI_000_012<tab>No, no, it is I who should be thanking you. Once more I can enjoy sunny days and blue skies clear of birds and their unsavory gifts. Yes, yes, life has never been better.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_GYOKEI_000_012オラもオタクらと出会って以来、景気が上向きっぺよ～。
不幸の壺が戻ってくる気配もないし、お気楽な毎日だっぺな～。
神気に満ちた宝物殿とやらには、恐れ入ったっぺよ！

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_013<tab>Ah, so the curse was lifted as Tsukumo predicted. A pity he could not come with us to hear the good news.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_013やはり、ツクモの言葉に嘘はなかったなぁ～。
だが、実はそのツクモが動かなくなってしまったのだぁ～。
此度の訪問は、そのことも伝えるつもりであったぁ～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_GYOKEI_000_014<tab>Tsukumo? Who is that? It sounds more like a flavorful dish than a person.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_GYOKEI_000_014ぺぺぺ！？
その「つくも」……ってのは、なんだっぺか！？
おいしい海藻かなんかっぺか？

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_015<tab>Come now, Gyokei. Surely you remember the talking doll that accompanied me when we first met?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_015そ、そなた、ツクモを忘れたというのかぁ～！？
甲高い声で、よくしゃべる、コウジン族の人形だぁ～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_GYOKEI_000_016<tab>What a silly, silly Kojin you are. As if I would forget something so remarkable as that. There was no such thing present when I met the two of you, no, no.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_GYOKEI_000_016しゃべる人形……？
そんな珍しいモンなら、忘れるわけないっぺよ！
オラが出会ったのは、オタクらふたりだけっぺな！

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_017<tab>What in the kami's name is going on?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_017むむむ……。
)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、これいかに～？

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_Q1_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_A1_000_001<tab>Perhaps the stress of that day affected his memory.
target: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_A1_000_001<tab>気が動転していたのだろう

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_018<tab>I suppose that's possible. It's not uncommon for one's memory to become hazy when thinking back on traumatic experiences.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_018確かに、あのとき、ギョケイ殿は紅甲羅に襲われていたぁ～。
気が動転し、記憶が曖昧になっているのやもしれんなぁ～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_019<tab>I suppose being attacked by Hirumaki was a rather traumatic experience. Perhaps the stress of it all has affected his memory.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_019)) (( )) 02 /var>殿にもわからぬかぁ～。
あのとき、ギョケイ殿は紅甲羅に襲われていたゆえ、
気が動転し、記憶が曖昧になっているのやもしれぬ～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_020<tab>When a foe is truly formidable, even I cannot clearly recall what happened when we exchanged blows.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_020拙者とて、強敵との真剣勝負においては、
己がいかに戦ったのか、覚えておらぬときがある～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_021<tab>At any rate, it would be unkind to make him relive his meeting with the Red.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_021ギョケイ殿を問い詰め、紅甲羅と対峙した恐怖を、
思い出させるのも酷というものぉ～。
そろそろ、お暇するとしよう～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_022<tab>We won't keep you any longer, Gyokei. Take care, and may the blessings of the kami be upon you.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_022ともかく、里の者はギョケイ殿との取引を歓迎している～。
今後とも、よき縁を結んでいこうぞぉ～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_GYOKEI_000_023<tab>Farewell, my friends. Next time I will go to visit you in Tamamizu, yes, yes.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_GYOKEI_000_023ぺぺぺ！
もちろんだっぺな！
いつか、オラもオタクらの宝物殿を見にいくっぺよ！

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_024<tab>What say we visit Reunion next? Uchikin is likely a master of marksmanship by now.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_024では、)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、
次は、再会の市の「ウチキン」を訪ねよう～！

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_GYOKEI_000_029<tab>If you happen to come across that talking doll Kabuto spoke of, I would like to see it very, very much.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_GYOKEI_000_029ぺぺぺ、達者でなっぺな！
それにしても、しゃべる人形……
オラも見てみたいっぺよ！

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_029<tab>The road to the Azim Steppe was longer than I thought. I can scarcely believe Makura traveled all this way before our battle on the Isle of Zekki.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_029アジムステップは、やはり遠い～。
だというのに、マクラときたら、
決戦の日、ここまで来てくれたのだなぁ～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_UCHIKINPAPA_000_028<tab>...
target: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_UCHIKINPAPA_000_028<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SYSTEM_000_029<tab>Uchikin's father welcomes you with a warm smile. He seems quite glad for your visit.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SYSTEM_000_029満面の微笑みで、迎えてくれた。
どうやら、)) (( )) 02 /var>と、
カブトたちの訪問を喜んでくれているようだ。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_UCHIKIN_000_030<tab>...
target: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_UCHIKIN_000_030<tab>(-ウチキンと父親-)…………。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_031<tab>It is good to see you both. Talk of your prowess is still hot on the lips of every merchant in Reunion. Your father must be proud.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_031ふたりとも、再会を喜んでくれているようだぁ～。
拙者、さきほど少しばかり、市場の様子も見て来たが、
ウチキンの弓の腕はますますあがったとの噂だったぁ～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_UCHIKIN_000_032<tab>...
target: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_UCHIKIN_000_032<tab>(-ウチキンと父親-)…………。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_033<tab>Please, there is no need to thank us. No, it is I who should be thanking you. If not for your generosity, we never would have had the means to rescue our dear Tsukumo from the Red Kojin.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_033弓を取り戻したことへの感謝ならば、無用ぞぉ～！
こちらこそ、ツクモ奪還の折、ケスティル族の武器には、
大いに助けられたゆえ、心より感謝いたす～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_034<tab>That...was a bow to thank us, yes? Would that Tsukumo were here. He was quite adept at interpreting your expressions.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_034……そういえば、初めて再会の市を訪れたときは、
物言わぬケスティル族の心を、ツクモが通訳してくれたなぁ～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_UCHIKIN_000_035<tab>...
target: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_UCHIKIN_000_035<tab>(-ウチキンと父親-)…………。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_036<tab>Does that mean you don't remember Tsukumo? A talking doll no higher than my knee, in the likeness of a Kojin?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_036む、なぜに、ふたりとも不思議そうにしているのだぁ～？
ツクモとは、甲高い声でしゃべるコウジン族の人形だぁ～。
まさか、覚えておらぬのかぁ～？

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_UCHIKIN_000_037<tab>...
target: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_UCHIKIN_000_037<tab>(-ウチキンと父親-)…………。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_038<tab>First Gyokei and now these two. I don't know what's going on here but it can't be good.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_038)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、これはいったい……？
ギョケイ殿のみならず、ウチキン親子までもが、
ツクモを忘れてしまったとはぁ～！？

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_039<tab>Perhaps we should go and visit Shihoumi. Surely she of all people would remember Tsukumo.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_039クガネの「シホウミ」殿にも確認してみよう～。
ツクモを授けてくれた本人ならば、さすがに覚えておろう～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_040<tab>Thank you for your time, but we must be leaving. Blessings of the kami be upon you.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_040そんなわけで、拙者どもはこれにてぇ～。
今後も、縁を強く結んでまいろう～！

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_UCHIKIN_000_041<tab>...
target: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_UCHIKIN_000_041<tab>(-ウチキンと父親-)…………。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_UCHIKIN000_046<tab>...
target: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_UCHIKIN000_046<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SYSTEM_000_047<tab>Uchikin seems very apologetic. Unable to recall Tsukumo, perhaps he believes he has given offense.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SYSTEM_000_047申し訳なさそうにしている。
だが、どうしてもツクモを思い出せないようだ。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_UCHIKINPAPA_000_048<tab>...
target: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_UCHIKINPAPA_000_048<tab>…………。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SYSTEM_000_049<tab>Uchikin's father gestures enthusiastically, as if to wish you safe travels.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SYSTEM_000_049カブトと冒険者との再会と、ふたりの旅の安全を願い、
送りだしてくれているようだ。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_049<tab>Shihoumi was the one who offered me Tsukumo as a gift. That she could forget him is unthinkable.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_049ツクモの心の結晶を、我が兜にあつらえてくれた、
シホウミ殿なら、ツクモを忘れるはずがない……！

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SHIHOUMI_000_050<tab><var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Good evening)) ((Good morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Good day to you)) ((Good evening)) /var>)) /var>, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Kabuto. To what do I owe the pleasure of this visit?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SHIHOUMI_000_050まあ、おふたりが訪ねて下さるなんて、光栄です！
カブト様は不安そうですが……今日はどんなご用件で？

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_051<tab>I realize this is sudden, but... Do you recognize the jewel on my helmet?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_051シホウミ殿……拙者の兜にはめられた、
二藍色の宝玉を覚えておられるかぁ～？

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SHIHOUMI_000_052<tab>Of course. I was the one who set it for you.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SHIHOUMI_000_052ええ、もちろん！
私が、兜にとりつけましたから！

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_053<tab>Oh, thank the kami! Then you also remember Tsukumo, the doll from whence it came?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_053おお、やはりシホウミ殿は、この宝玉を覚えているか！
では、この宝玉を生み出した、コウジン族のカラクリ人形、
ツクモのことも、もちろん覚えておるなぁ～？

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SHIHOUMI_000_054<tab>You mean the karakuri puppet I gave you as a gift for rescuing me?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SHIHOUMI_000_054おかしな事をおっしゃいますね。
そもそも、あのカラクリ人形は、私が助けていただいたお礼として、
カブト様に贈ったものではありませんか？

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_055<tab>The very same.
target: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_055<tab>おお、そうだ、そうなのだぁ～！

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SHIHOUMI_000_056<tab>Yes, I remember. It was so old and worn. I was honestly quite surprised you were so taken with it. The way you would clutch it in your arms, and you named it Tsukumo. I thought it was quite touching.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SHIHOUMI_000_056古びて動かない人形だというのに、カブト様は気に入られ、
「ツクモ」と名付けて大切にしてくださったので、心打たれました。
だから私は、人形より出てきた宝玉を……兜に……おや？

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SHIHOUMI_000_057<tab>Though I must say, it was quite peculiar to see materia produced from a doll. It usually comes from arms or armor after a great deal of use.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SHIHOUMI_000_057おかしいですね……。
なぜ、宝玉が人形の中から出てきたのでしょう……？
必要な部品でもなんでもないのに……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_058<tab>But you claimed this is what brought Tsukumo to life!
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_058この兜の宝玉こそが、ツクモに宿った心の結晶だと、
そう言ったのは、シホウミ殿ご自身ではないかぁ～！
もしや、それすら覚えていないのかぁ～？

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SHIHOUMI_000_059<tab>What? I said no such thing. I know not whose spirit gave form to that materia, but I fear affixing it to your helmet has clouded your memory.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SHIHOUMI_000_059私が、そんなことを……！？
物に宿った人の意志を結晶化した宝玉……つまりマテリアを、
兜につけたせいで、カブト様の記憶に影響が出たのやも……？

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_060<tab>No! Tsukumo was alive, I tell you! He was always there to say what I could not, and he helped me establish relations with a great many people.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_060いいや、ツクモは確実に動いていたぁ～！
ツクモは、口下手な拙者の代わりに言葉を紡ぎ、
多くの人と縁を結んでくれたのだぁ～！！

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SHIHOUMI_000_061<tab>I'm sorry, Kabuto. I do not question this puppet meant a great deal to you, but if it truly was able to walk or talk, I was not witness to it.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SHIHOUMI_000_061その様子をみると、カブト様の思い違いではなさそうですね。
確かに、人形にまつわる大事な縁があった気はしますが……
ごめんなさい……やっぱり思い出せません……。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_062<tab>Have I gone mad, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? How can no one remember? After everything we've accomplished.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_062)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、
これは、おかしな事態が起きているようだぁ～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_063<tab>Do you suppose my brothers have forgotten him as well? No one has spoken of Tsukumo since the battle on the Isle of Zekki, but I'm beginning to suspect it's not to save me grief.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_063ツクモが止まってから、あらためて語り合ってはいないが、
まさか、里の皆も覚えていないのだろうかぁ～！？
急ぎ、タマミズに戻り、確認してみるとしよう～！

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_064<tab>Sorry to have troubled you. I only meant to come and give thanks for the puppet and your wonderful work on my helmet. Take care, Shihoumi.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_064シホウミ殿、宝玉飾りの兜もカラクリ人形も、拙者のお宝だぁ～。
これらを授けてくれた、シホウミ殿に感謝している～。
これからも、縁を大切にしていこう～！

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SHIHOUMI_000_065<tab>I pray the kami guide you to the answers you seek.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SHIHOUMI_000_065はい、ぜひ。
カブト様の探している真実が見つかりますように……！

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_066<tab>Let us return to Tamamizu. I would have a word with the elder.
target: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_066<tab>では、急ぎ、碧のタマミズに戻り、長老に確認してみよう～！

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SHIHOUMI_000_069<tab>There must be something special about that puppet to excite Kabuto so. If only I could remember what...
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SHIHOUMI_000_069とても大事な縁があった気がするのですが……
だめです、やはり思い出せません……。
カブト様の探している真実が見つかりますように……！

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_069<tab>The mere thought of my brothers forgetting Tsukumo is too much to bear.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_069)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、待っていたぁ～。
長老までがツクモを忘れていたらと思うと恐ろしくて、
拙者ひとりでは、声をかけられずにいたぁ～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_BUNCHIN_000_070<tab>What brings the two of you here? By all rights you should be resting, Kabuto.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_BUNCHIN_000_070フォフォフォ……。
ふたりそろって、どうされましたかなぁ～？

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_071<tab>A question has been weighing on my mind for some time now, and...well...
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_071じ、実は、奇妙な事態が起きており、
確認したいことがあるのだぁ～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_MAKURA_000_073<tab>There you are! I've assembled the Divine Circle as you asked. What is it you wished to discuss?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_MAKURA_000_073(-マクラの声-)おーい、カブト～！
言われた通り、「碧の宝探衆」をつれてきたよぉ～。
それで、話ってなあにぃ～？

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_074<tab>Thank you all for coming. No one has spoken of him since he was lost to us, but I wished to speak with you all about Tsukumo.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_074皆に揃ってもらったのは、ほかでもない～。
タマミズの宝物殿を宝で満たした我ら「碧の宝探衆」、
これを結成したツクモを、皆は忘れていないよなぁ～？

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_BUNCHIN_000_075<tab>Tsukumo...? Ah, do you mean the puppet you enshrined in the treasure vault?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_BUNCHIN_000_075これは異な事を申すのう～。
ツクモ様とは、カブトよ、お前が手に入れ、
今も宝物殿の中央に鎮座しておられる宝物ではないかぁ～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_076<tab>So you do remember! I was beginning to fear everyone had forgotten the founder of our fellowship.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_076おお、そうだ、そうだ、そのとおりだぁ～！
やはり皆、ツクモのことを覚えているかぁ～！

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_BUNCHIN_000_077<tab>What are you saying, Kabuto? It was you who formed the Divine Circle.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_BUNCHIN_000_077だが、カブト……。
ツクモ様が「碧の宝探衆」を結成したとは、いったい？
結成したのは、お前自身だろう～？

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_078<tab>No... No, it was Tsukumo. Why can none of you remember?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_078そ、そんなぁ～！？
長老や宝探衆でも、ツクモが動いたことを覚えていないとぉ～！？
あの甲高い声も、ちょこまかと動くしぐさも…………。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_079<tab>I didn't think to ask, seeing as you accompanied me on my travels about Othard, but now I fear I must.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_079)) (( )) 02 /var>殿……。
貴殿は、ツクモと拙者とともに各地に同行してくれたぁ～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_080<tab>Tell me true, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─do you remember Tsukumo?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_080ゆえに、あえて問わずにいたが、今こそ問おう～。
貴殿だけは、ツクモのことを忘れてはおらぬよなぁ～？

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_Q2_000_000<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_A2_000_001<tab>Of course I remember.
target: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_A2_000_001<tab>もちろん覚えてる

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_A2_000_002<tab>I'm sorry, but I don't.
target: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_A2_000_002<tab>何のことだかわからない

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_081<tab>Oh, what a relief. I thought I was losing my mind.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_081よかった……本当に安心したぞぉ～。
拙者の夢かと疑いもしたが、やはりツクモは実在し、
宝物殿にお宝を満たすため、拙者を導いてくれていたぁ～！

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_BUNCHIN_000_082<tab>Curious that only the two of you can recall Tsukumo as more than a mere doll.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_BUNCHIN_000_082フォフォフォ……。
どうやら、お客人とカブトのみが知る、
宝探衆結成の功労者がおったようじゃなぁ～？

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_BUNCHIN_000_083<tab>But perhaps this is not without reason. I believe the kami was meant to guide you on a journey of enlightenment. A journey only you were meant to remember.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_BUNCHIN_000_083だとしたら、こうは考えられんかぁ～？
あの人形には、カブトを導くために付喪神様が宿られた、とぉ～。
それゆえ、お前以外の記憶には、残っておらぬのではぁ～？

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_BUNCHIN_000_084<tab>Yet it seems our friend <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> here possesses a rare gift, one that allows <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> to recall that which others cannot.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_BUNCHIN_000_084しかし、お客人は不可思議な力をお持ちのようじゃ～。
ゆえに、カブトにしか見えぬ、付喪神様が見えたのじゃろう～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_085<tab>That can't be! I've seen him speak with you. With all of you.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_085そ、そんな……それでも、拙者は認められぬ！
拙者の夢かと疑いもしたが、やはりツクモは実在し、
宝物殿にお宝を満たすため、拙者を導いてくれていたぁ～！

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_BUNCHIN_000_086<tab>Curious that only you can recall Tsukumo as more than a mere doll.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_BUNCHIN_000_086フォフォフォ……。
どうやら、カブトのみが知る、
宝探衆結成の功労者がおったようじゃなぁ～？

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_BUNCHIN_000_087<tab>But perhaps this is not without reason. I believe this spirit was meant to guide you on a journey of enlightenment. A journey only you were meant to remember.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_BUNCHIN_000_087だとしたら、こうは考えられんかぁ～？
あの人形には、カブトを導くために付喪神様が宿られた、とぉ～。
それゆえ、お前以外の記憶には、残っておらぬのではぁ～？

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_088<tab>You needn't mince words, Elder. You think this all a figment of my imagination, don't you?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_088そんな……あの甲高い声でよくしゃべるツクモは……
今も頭上で輝く、この宝玉を生み出したツクモは……
拙者の妄想だというのかぁ～！？

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_BUNCHIN_000_089<tab>Not at all. In fact, I had a similar experience many years ago. At the time I assumed no one would believe me, and so I have kept it to myself all this time.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_BUNCHIN_000_089否、わしも、その昔、似たような経験をしたことがあるのじゃ～。
言ったところで、信じてもらえぬと黙っておったがなぁ～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_BUNCHIN_000_090<tab>There are myriad kami in this world, each with their own will, their own purpose. In the end, it would seem this kami was meant not for the Divine Circle, but for you.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_BUNCHIN_000_090人形にお宿りになられたのも、
きっと、カブトのための付喪神様だったのじゃろぉ～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_BUNCHIN_000_091<tab>
target: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_BUNCHIN_000_091<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_MAKURA_000_092<tab>I would be lying if I said I wasn't jealous. Oh, what I wouldn't give for such divine guidance.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_MAKURA_000_092自分だけの付喪神様と会うなんて、
なんだか羨ましいわぁ～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_BUNCHIN_000_093<tab>This is not the time for envy, Makura, but praise. The kami saw fit to make Kabuto a fine leader, and the Blue have gained new allies because of it.
target: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_BUNCHIN_000_093<tab>うむ、カブトは、よき縁をえたのだなぁ～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_094<tab>Truth be told, I can scarcely believe how far I've come. Looking back I can see how foolish I was to think protecting my brothers meant having to push them away.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_094拙者は、)) (( )) 02 /var>殿に憧れ、
行動を共にしたいと願いながら、本心を押し殺したぁ～。
仲間を守りたいと願いながら、仲間を遠ざけたぁ～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_095<tab>Tsukumo taught me the bonds we share are worth more than any treasure.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_095だが、ツクモが拙者を正しき道へ導いてくれたぁ～。
今や、本心を押し殺すことなどできぬほどだぁ～。
心の望むままに、縁もお宝も手に入れて、大事にしたい～！

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_BUNCHIN_000_096<tab>Heed well the lessons you have learned here, Kabuto. I sense the path before you leads to a great many things.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_BUNCHIN_000_096それでこそ、己も仲間も大切にできるというものよぉ～。
己の本心と縁を結ばずして、他者と縁など結べぬからなぁ～。
これぞ、お前の付喪神様の教えじゃろうてぇ～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_097<tab>Wherever the path may lead, we will walk it together. It's what Tsukumo would have wanted.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_097)) (( )) 02 /var>殿に、宝探衆……。
拙者を取り巻くすべてが、ツクモからの贈り物に思える～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_098<tab>Our quest for treasure begins anew. For the Blue!
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_KABUTO_000_098ゆえに拙者は、これからも、
すべてを守り、縁もお宝もさらに増やしていくぞぉ～！

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SYSTEM_000_100<tab>You have achieved <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Bloodsworn<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> reputation with the Kojin.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SYSTEM_000_100「コウジン族：碧甲羅」との友好関係が、
「誓約★」になりました。
冒険者の働きによって、彼らと固い約束で結ばれたようです。

source: TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SYSTEM_000_101<tab>You will receive an experience point bonus upon completion of the Kojin beast tribe daily quests.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN006_02978_SYSTEM_000_101これ以降、「コウジン族：碧甲羅」の、
「蛮族デイリークエスト」で獲得できる経験値に、
いっそうのボーナスが付加されます！
